extendedInfo.description: work from home opportunity for students, work at home mums and men & women, be your own boss, work the hours you want, no minimum order,we sell perfume, aftershave, makeup and more, be a preferred customer (free to join, and earn as you sell. sell to your friends, family, customers) or even take it into work. to become a distributor (starter packs from Â£14.50) you can fill in the online form from the web site and order your kit then you can make sales and build your team, get your friends, staff people you know to join under you. earn 33% on each sale and you get rewards from fm for the more you sell. FM Group is a global company and growing fast and are alot cheaper than the high street. do you where the bottle when you go out? like your brands but not the price! try fm at a great price.get paid to smell great.
